properties.name: spring.application.config.rest.control.enabled
properties.description: Whether config rest control is enabled.

properties.name: spring.application.config.format
properties.description: Config format, it can be xml or json.

properties.name: spring.application.config.path
properties.description: Config path, it can be classpath:xxx or file:xxx.

properties.name: spring.application.default.properties.path
properties.description: Default properties path, it can be classpath:xxx or file:xxx.

properties.name: spring.application.no.server.found.notification.enabled
properties.description: Whether no server found notification is enabled.
